user.title: Google Drive Setup
user.description:
To connect Home Assistant to your Google Drive account, you must first provide a Google client ID and client secret. Once you’ve entered those credentials, you’ll be sent to Google’s consent screen where you can authorize Home Assistant to access your Drive.

For step‑by‑step instructions on creating your client ID and secret, please visit the [Integration documentation](https://github.com/wisse-smit/ha_google_drive_file_manager?tab=readme-ov-file#google-cloud-setting-up-the-oauth-consent-screen--credentials) and follow the steps.
